repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Library

did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Student Fee Advisory Committee Records
did.abstract: The collection contains records of the Student Fee Advisory Committe at the University of Connecticut, to include budget proposals, hearings, questions, and an overview of organizations and fees charged.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Student Fee Advisory Committee at the University of Connecticut was founded in 2002, and is currently known as the Student Activity and Service Fee Advisory Committee. The committee is charged with reviewing fees charged to university students each year, to include student activity fees, general university fund fees, and additional service fees such as parking fees.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains records of the Student Fee Advisory Committe at the University of Connecticut, and includesto include budget proposals, hearings, questions, and an overview of organizations and fees charged. The collection contains committee records from the year 2005 through 2008.

acqinfo.head: Provenance and Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred to the University Archives in 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from the owner(s) of the copyright.
